author: Linda Collison
content: Thanks for the balanced review of this film. Octopuses are fascinating, for sure. I always appreciate your reviews of films and books.

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
I heard a story of a chap who had a pet octopus in a tank at home. His wife gave him an ultimatum: either it goes or I do. She left and the octopus got a march larger tank.
I am not a fan of “pets” and far prefer the relationship going on here.
